item.description:
If you’re not on Twitter, the world has left you behind. Learn why it’s important for your brand to be on part of the various social media platforms out there and how you can use those networks to improve your brand awareness. Hear from top Social Media experts on why it’s crucial for online community building and carefully curating those relationships.


Buy your tickets online @efactor.com and save $5 off the regular admission of $20.


Speakers are Lou Cimaglia, PR director for Grow Socially, Inc., Chris Williams, Heatspring Learning Institute, and Meag Shaffer, VP of Social Media at Kel & Partners.


The Agenda:
6:30PM Networking / Light Dinner
7 PM Introductions and Panel Discussion
8PM Q&A
8:30 - 9:30PM Networking


*Make sure to check out EFactor.com, the world’s largest network for entrepreneurs to find useful resources, network with entrepreneurs in your industry, funding resources, and all event information.
item.name: Savvy Social Networking for Startups
